snippet: The company, which has pioneered some of the high-speed computer products that have advanced so-called cloud technology, raised $226 million in its initial public offering after pricing its shares well above the expected range.
abstract: The company, which has pioneered some of the high-speed computer products that have advanced so-called cloud technology, raised $226 million in its initial public offering after pricing its shares well above the expected range.

headline.main: Shares of Arista Networks Surge in Debut
